description.value: Action plugin to create a new issue in JIRA 1.0.0 -> streamlined (removed dependency on CURL and temporary file, removed unused parameters) uses the following JIRA client library : https://github.com/rcarz/jira-client 0.0.9: 20140619 --> made it more english... 0.0.8: 20140618 --> Label (Stichwort) als Feld hinzugefÃ¼gt 0.0.7: Logging angepasst

property.label: JIRA URL
property.description: The JIRA URL for creating a new issue

property.label: JIRA Project Key
property.description: The Key of the JIRA project for the new issue

property.label: JIRA Issue Type
property.description: The Type of the JIRA issue for the new issue (ex: Bug, Task, ...)

property.label: JIRA assignee
property.description: Assignee (optional, but if provided, must be known to JIRA)

property.label: JIRA Reporter
property.description: Reporter (optional, but if provided, must be known to JIRA)
